command.text: declare @ngay_ks varchar(8) select @ngay_ks = convert(varchar(8), ngay_ks, 112) from dmstt select 'this._lockedDate = ''' + @ngay_ks + ''';active$ShiftScheduleFilter(this);' as message return

declare @d varchar(512), @keyDept nvarchar(4000), @keyData nvarchar(4000) select @d = '' if exists(select 1 from dmstt where @nam >= year(ngay_gh1) and @nam <= year(ngay_gh2)) begin select top 0 ma_bp, ngay into #ngaynghi from hrdmngaynghi select @keyDept = 'bp_ref like ''' + replace(@bp_ref, '''', '') + '%''', @keyData = 'a.status = 1 and month(a.ngay) = ' + replace(ltrim(@thang), '''', '''''') + ' and year(a.ngay) = ' + replace(ltrim(@nam), '''', '''''') insert into #ngaynghi exec AI_ERP$HRM$DepartmentGetData @keyDept, 'hrdmngaynghi', 'ngay', @keyData, '', 0
select @d = @d + rtrim(day(ngay)) + ',' from #ngaynghi select @d = substring(@d, 0, len(@d)) end
select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._nonWorking = ''' + @d + ''';remove$GridReport$Filter(this.grid);' as script return

script.text: &JavascriptReportFilter; function active$ShiftScheduleFilter(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$ShiftScheduleFilter$ResponseComplete);a.getItem("thang").value=(new Date).getMonth()+1;a.getItem("nam").value=(new Date).getFullYear()}function close$ShiftScheduleFilter(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$ShiftScheduleFilter$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function onchange$ShiftScheduleFilter$Deparment(a){a.parentForm.request("Reference","Reference",["ma_bp"])}function on$ShiftScheduleFilter$ResponseComplete(b,d){var b=d.object,a=b.grid,f=d.type.Context,g=d.type.Result;switch(f){case"Reference":b.setItemControlBehavior("bp_ref",g[0].Value,true);b.setReferenceKeyFilter("ma_nv");break;case"Checking":a._refreshMemvars=true;a._month=b.getItemValue("thang");a._year=b.getItemValue("nam");a._dept=b.getItemValue("ma_bp");a._staff=b.getItemValue("ma_nv");a._pos=b.getItemValue("ma_vtr");a._grade=b.getItemValue("bac_ql");a._deptRef=b.getItemValue("bp_ref");a._deptName=b.getItemValue("ten_bp%l");var h=new Date(a._year,a._month,0),c=h.getDate(),e=b._lockedDate>=a._year.toString()+(a._month>9?a._month.toString():"0"+a._month.toString())+"01";a._denyEdit=e;if(e)a._denyMessage=b._language=="v"?"Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày khóa sổ.":"Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.";a._hiddenFields=[{Fields:"n31",Value:c==30||c==29||c==28},{Fields:"n30",Value:c==29||c==28},{Fields:"n29",Value:c==28}];a._alterTitle=[null,[["%s1",a._month,true],["%s2",a._year,true],["%s3",a._deptName,true]]]}}
